attributes.action: Revoke Bassetlaw Drug Treatment Being Provided By The Private Sector And Return It To Local GPwSI's
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned demand that Nottinghamshire County Public Health revoke the decision to transfer drug treatment provision from a successful community based shared care model to a private contractor

We further demand that Nottinghamshire County Public Health and/or the Government offer Bassetlaw residents a referendum on proposed changes to local drug treatment provision PRIOR to any service changes
